params.extraDebtInBase: amount of additional debt in EVMOS

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removePosition(address).details: remove all position of debtToken vault.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

repayDebt(address,uint256).details: Repay debt (decrease debt ratio, total staked amount(or share) does not change)

params.repaidDebt: amount of repaid debt in debtToken

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

positionIdOf.details: userAddress => vaultAddress => positionId (array Index of position)

totalAmount.details: kor) 유저가 예치한 금액 + auto-compound된 금액

totalShare.details: kor) auto-compound되어도 totalShare는 변하지 않음.  유저는 예치하는 시점에 (예치 금액/totalAmount) * totalShare에 해당하는 share를 받음.

amountToShare(uint256).notice: 유저는 예치하는 시점에 (예치 금액 / totalAmount) * totalShare에 해당하는 share를 받음.

repayDebt(address,uint256).notice: user should repay debt using debtTokenuser approve should be preceded
